meanings.sent1: The retrimmed curtains looked fresh and neat.
meanings.sent2: She bought a retrimmed dress for the party.
meanings.sent3: The retrimmed bushes made the garden look well-kept.
meanings.sent4: The retrimmed hair gave her a whole new look.
meanings.sent5: The retrimmed room felt cozy and inviting.

meanings.sent1: He retrimmed the hedge to make it tidy.
meanings.sent2: She retrimmed the edges of the paper with precision.
meanings.sent3: The barber accidentally retrimmed his own hair.
meanings.sent4: She retrimmed the story to fit the new audience.
meanings.sent5: The tailor retrimmed the coat to fit perfectly.
